headline: PPL Electric Utilities making necessary investments to strengthen and modernize infrastructure and expand services and support for customers
summary: PPL Electric Utilities is making necessary investments to build and maintain a stronger, smarter and more resilient electric grid to better withstand increasingly severe weather, prevent outages and improve service to customers. To fund these ongoing investments, the company has filed its first distribution base rate request in a decade.

headline: WEC Energy Gains From Demand Growth & New Investment
summary: WEC rides the rising C&I demand and a $28 billion clean-energy plan, but faces pressure from tough competition and regulations.
